name: Nostalgia (itch) (Ziro Dev)
description:
This is a short high score based minigame, I made it because it reminded me of the games I used to play when I was younger, it's very short, but I would love to expand it by filling the rest of the arcade.

The games runs terribly on HTML 5, so please try the downloaded version.

Please take the time to fill this short survey, so I can improve the game.
